author: Staff Reporter
text:
Knitwear exporters here heaved a sigh of relief as the Union Government had increased the service tax refund from 0.18 per cent to 0.21 per cent.

“The benefit, which can be claimed as a percentage of the declared Free on Board (FOB) value of the goods, will increase the competitiveness of the knitwear industry”, observed A. Sakthivel, president of Tirupur Exporters Association.

Many industrial associations in Tirupur knitwear cluster had been making appeals for quite some time to get the service tax refund enhanced.

Asian market

“The sector has been facing many issues arisen due to the recent currency volatility in Asian markets which was affecting the export prowess. So, this increase in the refund will ensure more funds for market expansion”, said exporters.
title: Knitwear exporters heave sigh of relief
